org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.disk.journal

Class ReadOnlyJournal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.disk.journal.Journal
      • org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.disk.journal.ReadOnlyJournal

  • public class ReadOnlyJournal
extends Journal
    An AsyncDataManager that works in read only mode against multiple data directories. Useful for reading back archived data files.
